title: Action
description: A hierarchical task or action that can be performed, extending Schema.org Action with task management specific properties including project organization, GTD contexts, and hierarchical structuring

priority.title: priority
priority.description: Priority level (1-4) based on Eisenhower Decision Matrix principles

byDay.title: byDay
byDay.description: Days of week for recurrence (Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun)

dueDateTime.title: dueDateTime
dueDateTime.description: When action must be completed by (deadline)

dueTime.title: dueTime
dueTime.description: Time action must be completed by

durationMinutes.title: durationMinutes
durationMinutes.description: Expected duration in minutes for completing this action

depth.title: depth
depth.description: Optional calculated hierarchical depth level (0-5). When specified, must match actual nesting level. Can be computed from parentAction chains.

recurrenceInterval.title: recurrenceInterval
recurrenceInterval.description: Interval for recurrence (default 1, meaning every occurrence)

completedDateTime.title: completedDateTime
completedDateTime.description: When action was actually completed (auto-generated by tooling)

doDateTime.title: doDateTime
doDateTime.description: When action should be performed (scheduled start time)

recurrenceFrequency.title: recurrenceFrequency
recurrenceFrequency.description: Recurrence frequency based on iCalendar RRULE patterns (DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, YEARLY)

byMonthDay.title: byMonthDay
byMonthDay.description: Days of month for recurrence (1-31, negative values count from end of month)

byMonth.title: byMonth
byMonth.description: Months for yearly recurrence (Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, Dec)

uuid.title: uuid
uuid.description: Version 7 UUID identifier for universal uniqueness

context.title: context
context.description: GTD-style context tag indicating where, when, or with what tools this action can be performed. Multiple contexts allowed.

dueDate.title: dueDate
dueDate.description: Date action must be completed by
